description: This file contains the implementation of the Bootstrap affix plugin (version 3.2.0), which manages element positioning based on scroll position, including class toggling and event handling.

classes.name: Affix
classes.description: Class defining the affix behavior, including methods for calculating pinned offset, checking position, and handling class toggling based on scroll position.

methods.name: getPinnedOffset
methods.description: Calculates and returns the pinned offset for the element.

methods.name: checkPositionWithEventLoop
methods.description: Schedules a position check after a short delay.

methods.name: checkPosition
methods.description: Determines the affix state ('top', 'bottom', or false) based on scroll position and updates classes accordingly.
